info.name: Campus Admin API
info.description:
This is a Postman Collection for the ***Campus Admin API*** endpoints. 

Refer to the main [Campus Admin API documentation](<link>) for more details.

If you have an API-related question, you can also discuss in the developer [community forum](<link>).



## Installation ##

### Quick install

Go to the [Collection](https://documenter.getpostman.com/view/9042599/TWDfDtEK) and click `Run in Postman`.

### Manual install

You can also download this Collection from a GitHub repo here: [github_link](<link>)


## Environment

This Collection includes a pre-configured Environment. You will need to set up the following variables in order to run each request. Otherwise you have to manually put your baseurl and token for every request  :

|Name|Description|
|---|---|
|`baseurl`|Your Base URL|
|`token`|Your access token|

item.name: Campus
View  a Particular Campus- Course Provider Sites

request.description:
Create a campus-course provider site

**URL** : `/course-provider-sites/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload**

```json
{
    "name" : "South Building",
    "provider" : "47fac15b-30f4-4f79-b06e-e0966a1b9d98",
    "code" : "120"

}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
    "url": "https://api.admin.dev.campus.com/course-provider-sites/",
    "date_time": "2021-07-07T18:53:41.808306Z",
    "data": {
        "id": "60e5f83526fa465229cc9b51",
        "provider": {
            "id": "47fac15b-30f4-4f79-b06e-e0966a1b9d98",
            "name": "test",
            "code": "code",
            "course_provider_logo_uri": "https://static.dev.campus.com/uploads/af69c370-d242-48a8-8998-a1a4de08a973.png",
            "content_db_reference": "60e16b10a16cf33100e29c4c"
        },
        "name": "South Building",
        "code": "120"
    }
}
```

Update a particular Campus- Course Provider Sites

**URL** : `/course-provider-sites/<course-provider-sites_id>`

**Method** : `PATCH`

**Payload** :
```json
{
    "name": "South Building",
    "code": "SFUCA"
}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
  "url": "http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/course-provider-sites/5fc5e7c385210d351a100528/",
  "date_time": "2021-03-03T19:09:06.229674Z",
  "data": {
    "id": "5fc5e7c385210d351a100528",
    "provider": {
      "id": "b6436570-4c52-4a5e-b328-cd01d260c299",
      "name": "Simon Fraser University",
      "code": "SFUCA",
      "course_provider_logo_uri": null,
      "content_db_reference": "5e72482cf069d3ce6d4f24da"
    },
    "name": "Simon Fraser University2",
    "code": "SFUCA"
  }
}
```

Create a catalog

**URL** : `/catalogs/<catalog_id>/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload** : Mutlitpart data (because image is a filefield) with these fields: title, store, description, image, start_date, end_date, is_published

**Response**: Create a catalog

Certificate Description

\r\n\r\n

Cybersecurity, also known as Information Security, is the protection of data and personally identifiable information from malicious attacks, theft, and destruction. Failures of cybersecurity policies, both in large corporations and governmental agencies, have earned significant visibility and negative publicity in recent months and years. As the amount of data being stored continues to increase, and as hackers become more sophisticated, the need for cybersecurity is greater than ever.

\r\n\r\n

This Certificate in Cybersecurity offers lessons on the critical elements of information security, as well as foundational information about key certifications for professionals in the industry. Each of the eight courses in this suite will help learners master the vocabulary of the industry and offers examples, videos, interactive games, and review questions to ensure mastery of the material.

\r\n\r\n

Courses can be taken in any order. Upon successful completion, you can download and print a Certificate of Completion.

\r\n\r\n
\r\n\r\n\r\n

Key Features

\r\n\r\n
    \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Expert-supported\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Mobile-friendly\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Accessible\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Badge and credit-awarding\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Games & Flashcards\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Video content\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Real-world case studies\r\n
    • \r\n
  • \r\n \r\n Audio-enabled in app\r\n
    • \r\n
\r\n\r\n\r\n
\r\n\r\n

Refund Policy

\r\n\r\n

You may request a refund up to 5 days from the purchase date. The registration fee will only be refunded if less than 10% of each course in the certificate has been completed. Completion percentage can be viewed on the Course Progress page from within the course.

\r\n\r\n\r\n
\r\n\r\n

Notes

\r\n\r\n

All courses in this certificate have an \"Ask the Expert\" feature, which submits your questions directly to an expert in the field you are studying. Questions are answered as quickly as possible and usually within 24 hours.

\r\n\r\n

This course does not require any additional purchases of supplementary materials.

\r\n\r\n

Learners must achieve an average test score of at least 70% to meet the minimum successful completion requirement and qualify to receive IACET CEUs. Learners will have three attempts at all graded assessments.

Create a course

**URL** : `/courses/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload** :

**Form Data**

```json
{
    "provider": "[uuid]",
    "title": "[string field]",
    "code": "[string field]",
    "inquiry_url": "[url field]",
    "external_id": "[string field]",
    "external_url": "[string field]",
    "slug": "[string field unique_with provider]",
    "level": "[choice field]",
    "summary": "[string field]",
    "description": "[string field]",
    "learning_outcome": "[string field]",
    "course_image_uri": "[dic field]",
    "syllabus_url": "[string field]",
    "content_ready": "[default False]"
}
```

**Data example** : These fields must be sent

```json
{
    "provider": "<course_provider_id>",
    "title": "Test",
    "external_id": "031332",
    "slug": "test",
    "description": "description",
}
```

Create a course provider. **URL** : `/course-providers/` **Method** : `POST` **Payload** : ```json { "address": "[string field]", "city": "[string field]", "state": "[int field]", "zipcode": "[int field]", "name": "[string field]", "code": "[string field]", "summary": "[string field]", "description": "[string field]", "website_url": "[url field]", "geo_location": "[point field]", "is_active": "[default True]", "course_provider_logo_uri": "[Image file is too large. Size should not exceed 4MB]" } ``` **Response** : **Content example** : ```json { "url": "http://api.account.dev.campus.com/admin/course-providers/", "date_time": "2020-10-29T07:25:05.517189Z", "data": { "id": "5e6f6dc42326a0c5b7d3f337", "_is_deleted": false, "deleted": false, "is_active": true, "created_at": "2020-03-16T12:15:00.747000Z", "updated_at": "2020-04-17T14:59:02.939000Z", "address": "79 Essex Street", "city": "New tt York ss test", "state": 36, "zipcode": 10002, "geo_location": { "type": "Point", "coordinates": [ 40.718032, -73.988676 ] }, "name": "International of Photography test", "code": "ICP", "logo": { "original": "uploads/48b6c9db-56d2-4fa0-8138-ac4ade0c5b53.png" }, "summary": "The International Center of Photography (ICP) is the world’s leading institution dedicated to photography and visual culture.", "description": "

The International Center of Photography is the world’s leading institution dedicated to photography and visual culture. Cornell Capa founded ICP in 1974 to champion “concerned photography”—socially and politically minded images that can educate and change the world. Through our exhibitions, education programs, community outreach, and public programs, ICP offers an open forum for dialogue about the power of the image.

", "website_url": "https://www.icp.org/", "_cls": "CourseProvider", "course_provider_logo_uri": "http://google.jpg" } } ```

Update the course provider if they are Owner. Update can be performed either fully or partially by the Owner of the course-provider. **URL** : `/course-providers/:id/` **Method** : `PATCH` **Permissions required** : User is course provider Owner **Payload** ```json { "address": "[string field]", "city": "[string field]", "state": "[int field]", "zipcode": "[int field]", "name": "[string field]", "code": "[string field]", "summary": "[string field]", "description": "[string field]", "website_url": "[url field]", "geo_location": "[point field]", "is_active": "[default True]", "course_provider_logo_uri": "[Image file is too large. Size should not exceed 4MB]" } ``` **Responses** : **Code** : `200 OK` ```json { "url": "http://api.account.dev.campus.com/admin/course-providers/", "date_time": "2020-10-29T07:25:05.517189Z", "data":{ "id": "5e6f6dc42326a0c5b7d3f337", "_is_deleted": false, "deleted": false, "is_active": true, "created_at": "2020-03-16T12:15:00.747000Z", "updated_at": "2020-04-17T14:59:02.939000Z", "address": "79 Essex Street", "city": "New tt York ss test", "state": 36, "zipcode": 10002, "geo_location": { "type": "Point", "coordinates": [ 40.718032, -73.988676 ] }, "name": "International of Photography test", "code": "ICP", "logo": { "original": "uploads/48b6c9db-56d2-4fa0-8138-ac4ade0c5b53.png" }, "summary": "The International Center of Photography (ICP) is the world’s leading institution dedicated to photography and visual culture.", "description": "

The International Center of Photography is the world’s leading institution dedicated to photography and visual culture. Cornell Capa founded ICP in 1974 to champion “concerned photography”—socially and politically minded images that can educate and change the world. Through our exhibitions, education programs, community outreach, and public programs, ICP offers an open forum for dialogue about the power of the image.

", "website_url": "https://www.icp.org/", "_cls": "CourseProvider", "course_provider_logo_uri": "http://google.jpg" } } ```

Filter course import list by date

**URL** : `import-task/?created_at__gte=2021-07-31&created_at__lte=2021-08-02`

**Method** : `GET`


**Response**

```json

```

Bulk import task

**URL** : `/import-task/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload** : import_type can be 3 types- course or certificate or sections. 
File format: it should be a csv file. The headers of the csv file are like this:
external_id, external_url, external_version_id, code, title, slug, description, learning_outcome, image, default_image, summary, syllabus_url, level, inquiry_url, keywords


**Form Data** 

```json
{
    "course_provider": "<course_provider_id>",
    "import_type": "course or certificate or sections",
    "filename": <csv file obj>
}
```

**Response**

```json
{
    "url": "https://api.admin.dev.campus.com/import-task/",
    "date_time": "2021-08-09T12:14:57.888628Z",
    "data": {
        "id": "bfe89c6c-c572-49d8-a6d0-f5e148e016a1",
        "course_provider": "Mind Edge",
        "import_type": "section",
        "filename": "https://static.dev.campus.com/uploads/section/20210809t121457_section.csv",
        "status": "in_progress",
        "status_message": null,
        "queue_processed": 0
    }
}
```

Course import requeue

**URL** : `/import-requeue/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload** : **Form Data** 


```json
{
    "import_task_id": "<import_task_id>"
}
```

**Response**

```json
{
    "status": "success"
}
```

item.name: Instructor

request.description:
View a particular Instructor 

**URL** : `/instructors/<instructor_id>`

**Method** : `GET`

**Response** :

```json
{
    "url": "https://api.admin.dev.campus.com/instructors/5ef62aeef1e0f50c12aaa45e/",
    "date_time": "2021-07-07T18:34:32.288159Z",

        "id": "5ef62aeef1e0f50c12aaa45e",
        "provider": {},
        "name": "Abizar A Lakdawalla",
        "external_id": "4961",
        "profile_urls": {},
        "image": {},
        "short_bio": null,
        "detail_bio": null
    }
}

```

Create an Instructor

**URL** : `/instructors/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload**

```json
{
    "name": "[unicode 64 chars max]",
    "provider": "<course_provider_id> ",
    "profile_urls": "profile_urls",
    "image": "image file",
    "short_bio": "[unicode 400 chars max]",
    "detail_bio": "[unicode 400 chars max]",
    "external_id": "[unicode 400 chars max]"
}

```

**Response** :

```json
{
  "url": "http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/instructors/",
  "date_time": "2021-03-02T16:30:36.691540Z",
```

item.description: ***Password change*** for an Admin

item.name: Payment Gateway

request.description:
Create a Payment Gateway

**URL** : `/payment-gateways/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload**

```json
{
    "name": "[unicode 128 chars max]",
    "sdk_version": "[unicode 20 chars max]",
    "last_update_date": "",
    "is_active": "[default False]",
    "class_name": "[unicode 30 chars max]",
}

```

**Data example** These fields must be sent

```json
{
    "name": "[unicode 128 chars max]",
}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
    "url": "http://api.account.dev.campus.com/admin/payment-gateways/",
    "date_time": "2020-11-09T04:47:51.719100Z",
    "data": {
        "id": "7f5543ae-2dc1-4960-bf00-2ee95d452ae7",
        "name": "Authorize.Net",
        "sdk_version": "Quia et quisquam off",
        "last_update_date": null,
        "is_active": false,
        "source_library_path": "/home/ec2-user/campus-identity-backend/app/payments/authorizenet",
        "class_name": "Brandon Hebert"
    }
}
```

Update a payment gateway. A PATCH request is used to make changes to one or multiple part of the resource at a location.

**URL** : `/payment-gateways/:id/`

**Method** : `PATCH`

**Payload**

```json
{
    "name": "[unicode 128 chars max]",
    "sdk_version": "[unicode 20 chars max]",
    "last_update_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
    "is_active": "[default False]",
    "class_name": "[unicode 30 chars max]",
}
```

**Data example**  
```json
{
    "name": "Authorize.Net",
}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
  "url": "http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/payment-gateways/aac46438-185a-4577-9b68-e74ee0666046/",
  "date_time": "2021-03-02T15:08:57.193430Z",
  "data": {
    "id": "aac46438-185a-4577-9b68-e74ee0666046",
    "name": "Authorize2.Net",
    "sdk_version": null,
    "last_update_date": "2021-03-02",
    "is_active": false,
    "source_library_path": "/opt/app/admin_api/payments/authnet",
    "class_name": null
  }
}
```

**Delete-profile**

Delete only the personally identifiable information of a profile/student, her profile links and other personal information.

**URL** : /delete-profile/

**Method** : DELETE

**Request Body (for single profile)** :

```
{"ids":"b53e795d-6fac-4761-bf87-eb887f493ede"}
```

**Request Body (for multiple profile batch delete)** :

```
{"ids":"b53e795d-6fac-4761-bf87-eb887f493ede, b53e795d-6fac-4761-bf87-eb877f493ecc"}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
  "url":"http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/delete-profile/",
  "date_time":"2021-01-18T09:11:50.349741Z",
  "data":{"message":"Students deleted successfully"}
}
```

item.name: Unlink An Identity Provider From Profile

request.description:
**Unliking is removing the specific Identity Provider in ProfileLink for a particular profile**

**URL** : /unlink-profile/

**Method** : DELETE

Request Body:

```
{"id": "b53e795d-6fac-4761-bf87-eb887f493ede"}

```

Response:
```
{"url":"http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/profile/unlink-profile/",
"date_time":"2021-01-18T09:11:50.349741Z",
"data":{"message":"Profile-Link deleted successfully"}
}

```

View refund payment status. Status can be of four types- requested, awaiting_verification,refunded and failed.

**URL** :  `/refunds/?status=requested` or `/refunds/?status=awaiting_verification` or `/refunds/?status=refunded` or `/refunds/?status=failed`

**Method** : `GET`

Request for refund

**URL** : `/refunds/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload** : task related fields have two options. "not_required" to disable & "pending" to enable.

```json
{
    "payment": "<payment_id>",
    "amount": "9",
    "note": "",
    "task_crm_update": "not_required",
    "task_tax_refund": "not_required",
    "task_cancel_enrollment": "pending"
}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
    "url": "https://api.admin.dev.campus.com/refunds/",
    "date_time": "2021-07-11T09:51:15.550089Z",
    "data": {
        "id": "1e7c0dd3-e7bc-4798-9808-3b96dad02820",
        "payment": "dac9131b-b900-4b79-966d-0f8e99dc0605",
        "amount": "9.00",
        "note": "",
        "status": "awaiting_verification",
        "requested_by": "ca94a2df-c929-460d-bd1a-10790380d5d6",
        "transaction_reference": "40069419363",
        "task_cancel_enrollment": "pending",
        "task_tax_refund": "not_required",
        "task_crm_update": "not_required"
    }
}
```

Restart the refund subtask

**URL** : `/retry-refund/?refund_id=<refund_id>&task_name=<task_name>`
There are 3 tasks- task_cancel_enrollment, task_tax_refund, task_crm_update

**Method** : `GET`

**Response** :

```json
{
    "status": "pending"
}
```

request.description:

```json
{

    "question_type": "multiselect",

}
```

Create a custom-roles

**URL** : `/custom-roles/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload**

```json
    
{
	"name" : "test",
	"permissions" : ["<permissions_id>"]
}

```

**Response** :

```json
{
  "url": "http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/custom-roles/",
  "date_time": "2021-02-23T08:16:29.643454Z",
  "data": {
    "id": "c308c357-3297-44a5-a07f-e6835014d41e",
    "name": "test",
    "permissions": [
      "8ba8ac62-8508-43f8-81a8-40d67f2c0045"
    ]
  }
}
```

Update a custom-role

**URL** : `/custom-roles/<custom-roles_id>`

**Method** : `PATCH`

**Payload** : A PATCH request is used to make changes to one or multiple part of the resource at a location.

```json
{
	"name" : "test",
	"permissions" : ["8ba8ac62-8508-43f8-81a8-40d67f2c0045","9736a0a9-e13e-4792-aa35-382c63fe8a3c"]
	
}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
  "url": "http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/custom-roles/c308c357-3297-44a5-a07f-e6835014d41e/",
  "date_time": "2021-02-23T08:42:30.364935Z",
  "data": {
    "id": "c308c357-3297-44a5-a07f-e6835014d41e",
    "name": "test",
    "permissions": [
      "8ba8ac62-8508-43f8-81a8-40d67f2c0045",
      "9736a0a9-e13e-4792-aa35-382c63fe8a3c"
    ]
  }
}
```

item.description: Here you can get ***Role*** related endpoints.

item.name: Schedule

request.description:
Get schedules

**URL** : `/schedules/?section__id=<section_id>`

**Method** : `GET`

**Response** :

```json
{
  "url": "http://api.admin.dev.campus.com/schedules/?section_id=0a20cf7e-4381-47f2-bdb1-3302310e5d2e",
  "date_time": "2021-03-02T20:05:57.787887Z",
  "page": {
    "previous_page": null,
    "page": 1,
    "next_page": null,
    "total": 0,
    "limit": 10
  },
  "data": []
}
```

Create a Schedule

**URL** : `/schedules/`

**Method** : `POST`

**Payload** :

```json
{
"section":"362c6e96-b17e-4f3d-800a-9caa711b61c8",
 "name":"Test Schedule2",
 "section_type":"Urgent",
 "start_at":"2021-03-04T14:37:13+06:00",
 "end_at":"2021-03-27T14:37:18+06:00",
 "building_name":"North Building",
 "building_code":"NB1",
 "room_name":"303"
}
```

**Response** :

```json
{
    "url": "https://api.admin.dev.campus.com/schedules/",
    "date_time": "2021-07-07T16:08:29.681432Z",
    "data": {
        "section_type": "Urgent",
        "external_version_id": null,
        "name": "Test Schedule2",
        "description": null,
        "start_at": "2021-03-04T08:37:13Z",
        "end_at": "2021-03-27T08:37:18Z",
        "building_name": "North Building",
        "building_code": "NB1",
        "room_name": "303",
        "location": "303, North Building(NB1)",
        "section": "362c6e96-b17e-4f3d-800a-9caa711b61c8"
    }
}
```

```json
{
  "course_provider": "56343945-00de-4770-bb7c-65c950b68fbc",

  "url_slug": "mindedge",
  "gtm_id": "",
  "template":<file obj>
```

```json
    "store_logo_uri": null,

  }
}
```

Update an User

**URL** : `/users/<id>`

**Method** : `PATCH`

**Payload** :

```json
{
    "first_name": "[unicode 64 chars max]",
    "last_name": "[unicode 64 chars max]",
    "username": "<course_provider_id> ",
    "password": "[unicode 64 chars max]",
    "email": "[unicode 64 chars max]",
    "primary_contact_number": "[unicode 64 chars max]",
    "role": "[unicode 64 chars max]",
    "is_active": "[default False]",
    "db_context": "[unicode 64 chars max]"
  
}
```
